pull.title: test: add unit test for non-standard txs with too large scriptSig
pull.body: Approaches the first missing test of issue #17394: Checks that the function `IsStandardTx()` returns rejection reason `"scriptsig-size"` if any one the inputs' scriptSig is larger than 1650 bytes.

events.message:
test: add unit test for non-standard txs with too large scriptSig

The function IsStandardTx() returns rejection reason "scriptsig-size" if any
one the inputs' scriptSig is larger than 1650 bytes.

events.body:

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17272](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17272.html) ([POLICY] Make multiple OP_RETURNS in a single TX standard by Bushstar)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

comments.body: this value seems like a magic number unrelated to the actual test. Could just make it MAX_MONEY since we don't want to make it dusty.
